response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This product holds immense significance and potential value to both of us. Given its intrinsic worth, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a generous offer considering the $1,500,000 value it holds for you. I believe this price strikes a balance between the value perceived by you and the fair market value of the product. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
